name: Gateway
description:
Get rich quick or die!

The gamble is the same for every gateway prospector. You strap yourself into an alien starship whose destination was programmed 500,000 years ago by a race called the Heechee. You may return with a motherlode of technology that will make you rich. More likely, you will die.

But when scientists discover the terrible secret behind the vanished Heechee civilization, you enter a desperate battle against an ancient race so ruthless and deadly that they are known simply as The Assassins.

* Explore exotic new worlds.
* Learn the ropes on Gateway Station, a 22nd century frontier city.
* Interact with alien races.
* Search deep space for traces of ancient Heechee civilization.
* Stunning cinematic animated effects, 256-color VGA graphics.
* Unique screen design featuring Legend's Next Generation Game System.
* Superb original Roland and AdLib musical score synchronized with your game play.
* Digitized sound effects.
* New screen formats: Pilot an interstellar scout ship, talk with characters, and operate high tech equipment.
* Based on the Hugo & Nebula award-winning series.
